Hi guys!

KhanWebHost SMC PVT LTD is a privately owned hosting company established in 2016. We are based out of Muzaffargarh, Pakistan. Here at KhanWebHost we are offering web hosting and server management to our valuable customers.

Shared Hosting/Reseller Hosting & VPS (Except USA) services have DDoS protection and a 99.9% uptime guarantee, with 24x7 Support via Support tickets & 9am-9PM Via Live Chat/Phone Call, in addition, we have a ton more features which are given below.

Few Features

  • 24/7 Technical Support Vis Support Ticket (GMT+5) 9am-9m (Via Live Chat/Phone Call)
  • DDOS Protection
  • OS( Windows Server 2012.2016,2019, Centos 6,7.8, Ubuntu )
